Package com.example.appointment

package com.example.appointment

This package implements the Model of the Model-View-Controller design pattern for the appointment scheduler. It has a Main class that starts the program and opens up the login page. It includes the ConnectionModel class that controls connection to the database for the program. It includes the Customer Combo Box Model that loads data into the customer combo boxes. It also includes multiple objects that form the foundation for everything the program uses: Users, Appointments, and Customers.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.example.appointment.controller
    This package implements the Controller of the Model-View-Controller design pattern for the appointment scheduler.
    com.example.appointment.exceptions
    This package implements unique exceptions that are widely used throughout the appointment scheduler program.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Appointment
    Creates a unique appointment object with the specified information.
    ConnectionModel
    A Singleton class that manages the database connection, and tracks the current language for the entire application.
    Customer
    A class to create a customer object.
    CustomerComboBoxModel
    A Singleton class that manages the combo boxes for the customer controllers enabling the combo box on the two customer scenes to have accurate Country and Division data.
    Launcher
     
    Main
    The main class that starts the appointment program and opens the login controller.
    User
    A class that creates a user object that has its own appointments.
